text: The 2002 African Women's Handball Championship was the 15th edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Morocco from 19 to 28 April 2002. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 2003 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Preliminary round== ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- ===Group C=== \---- \---- ==Second round== ===Group D=== \---- \---- ===Group E=== \---- \---- ==7–9 placement group== \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Fifth place game=== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2003 World Championship and the 2004 Summer Olympics qualifying tournament |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccccff| ||Qualified for the 2004 Summer Olympics qualifying tournament |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccccff |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |- |align=center|8|| |- |align=center|9|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 2002 Women African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship Category:2002 in Moroccan sport Category:2002 in African handball Category:April 2002 sports events in Africa Category:Women's handball in Morocco
